document.heading: District of Columbia Vehicle Cover Requirement Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-108, “District of Columbia Vehicle Cover Requirement Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-339, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 16, 1988 and March 1, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 16, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-150 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
